item.title: Wojtek add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Was that you or the duck?" -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Wojtek add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Wojtek add a quote by Jacques Derrida
item.description: "What cannot be said above all must not be silenced but written." -- Jacques Derrida

item.title: Wojtek add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Nobody realizes that some people expend tremendous energy merely to be normal." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Wojtek add a quote by Jean Genet
item.description: "To achieve harmony in bad taste is the height of elegance." -- Jean Genet

item.title: Wojtek add a quote by Peter De Vries
item.description: "Sometimes I write drunk and revise sober, and sometimes I write sober and revise drunk. But you have to have both elements in creation — the Apollonian and the Dionysian, or spontaneity and restraint, emotion and discipline." -- Peter De Vries

item.title: Wojtek add a quote by Thomas Pynchon
item.description: "Losing faith is a complicated business and takes time. There are no epiphanies, no "moments of truth." It takes much thought and concentration in the later phases, which thenselves come about through an accumulation of small accidents: examples of general injustice, misfortune falling upon the godly, prayers of one's own unanswered." -- Thomas Pynchon

item.title: Wojtek add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "When you're in jail, a good friend will be trying to bail you out. A best friend will be in the cell next to you saying, 'Damn, that was fun'." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Wojtek add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Wojtek add a quote by David Foster Wallace
item.description: "I do things like get in a taxi and say, "The library, and step on it." -- David Foster Wallace

item.title: Wojtek add a quote by P.G. Wodehouse
item.description: "Everything in life that’s any fun, as somebody wisely observed, is either immoral, illegal or fattening." -- P.G. Wodehouse

item.title: Wojtek add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "If I had a shiny gun I could have a world of fun Speeding bullets through the brains Of the folks that cause me pains :)" -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Wojtek add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "Most of the time I don't have much fun. The rest of the time I don't have any fun at all." -- Woody Allen
